comment: Sad to see some of the responses . There s no misunderstanding the original tweet . It s intentionally sexist . If you find that funny , so be it . But if you think it s funny to attack or ridicule Samson for calling out the tweet s sexist nature , you re just as bad , if not worse . <URL>

comment: The problem with those sexist jokes is that speaking up hardly makes it better , on the contrary . That s why usually , I wouldn t even try . And it s why most of the time , people like that just get away with it . The low-class replies to Samson s tweet just show the deeper issue .
